page.title: 13FIVE WAYS HOTEL
page.content:
This hotel is typical of many in Shanklin.It can take 35 people.The season starts at May and carries on till the end of September. At the beginning of the season we have school parties.The busiest part of the season is the end of July and all of August. at 8am the guests have early morning tea.Then at 9am the guests have breakfast served by a waitress .
You can have a choice of food. After breakfast a chambermaid comes in and cleans the rooms.There is a licensed bar which is open half an hour from six till half past six before dinner.Some nights you can have a choice and other nights it is a set meal.At night there is also a waitress who serves at the tables.After dinner at 9pm the bar opens till 12pm.
